callback_with_context.context_function_id: CcoRTDilemmaTrackedFactionRitual( Dilemma: self.StoredContextFromParent("CcoDilemmaRecord"), TrackedFaction: NullContextObject, Ritual: NullContextObject)

localised_text.tooltip_text: +1(Doesn't actually grant foreign slots, just adds to the pooled resource so we can test the dilemmas)
-1(Doesn't actually remove foreign slots, just removes from the pooled resource so we can test the dilemmas)

gifted_holder.componentleveltooltip: Sea Patrol Outposts||Shows how many Sea Patrol outposts you hold in settlements gifted to this faction. More outposts unlock additional dilemma options with this leader.\n\n[[col:yellow]]Outposts are lost if those settlements fall to a foreign culture or if you go to war with the faction.[[/col]]

callback_with_context.context_function_id: #this part contains initiatives 5-8 from the set so we need to provice the correct slot number when we activate them # Activate(self.ChildIndex + 4)

# if we have set an initiative_record from the dragonships tooltip redirect # AsurDomination.TryPlayShowAnimation
